title: Smoked haddock and leek risotto with roasted smoked haddock and parsley oil
ingredients: 225g/8oz undyed smoked haddock, cooked, skin removed, flaked
4 tbsp roughly chopped fresh flatleaf parsley
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 x 110g/4oz undyed smoked haddock fillets, skin removed
1 small bunch flatleaf parsley, roughly chopped
